title: What song do Australians love to hate? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say for a lot of Australians the song we love to hate is that shitty national anthem of ours, Advance Australia Fair. It’s supposed to uplift the nation but it’s more akin to a dirge, it would sound right for a funeral procession, it’s about as uplifting as a fart in a lift (elevator). The Pom’s get the stirring tune of God Save the Queen with all its history and calls to King and country, the Yanks belt out The Star Spangled Banner and an amazing number of them know the lyrics. We in Australia rarely know more than the first verse of ours because the shitty tune and lyrics inspire nothing more than apathy and feelings of bewilderment. Why the fuck do we have such a cunt of a song for our national anthem? Check out the shitty lyrics here but if you’re not up for a nap don’t play this boring bloody song. God I hate it.

I hate that dismal dirge Advance Australia Fair. It should be resigned to oblivion forever. It makes me cringe, surely we can come up something better than this hackneyed tuneless derivative non song. The French have La Marseillaise, the Americans have the Star Spangled Banner, the Russians have their State Anthem and we get .. THIS.
